This guide is a simplified overview of '''all non-experimental changes''' in [[Mounts of Mayhem]] ({{BE}} 1.21.130), which assumes at least some familiarity with [[The Copper Age]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 1.21.111), excluding experimental features in this version.

{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
|[[Camel Husk]]
|[[File:Camel Husk Walk JE1.gif|128px]]
|
*[[Desert]] (as part of [[Camel Husk#Spawning|Camel Husk Jockeys]]
|
*{{ItemLink|Rotten Flesh}}
|

* Can be tamed with rabbit's feet.
* Counts as a hostile [[monster]].
|-
|[[Nautilus]]
|[[File:Nautilus Breathe JE1.gif|150px]] [[File:Baby Nautilus Breathe BE2.gif|80px]]

|
*{{ItemLink|Nautilus Shell}}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|[[Horse]], [[donkey]], [[mule]], [[camel]], [[llama]], [[trader llama]]
|{{animate|White Horse.png;Donkey.png;Mule.png;Camel.png;Brown Llama.png;Brown Trader Llama.png|150px}}
|
No longer sinks in water while being ridden.
|-
|[[Piglin]]
|[[File:Piglin.png|150px]]
|
* Can now hold spears.
|-
|[[Zombie]], [[husk]], [[zombified piglin]]
|{{animate|Zombie.png;Husk.png;Zombified Piglin.png|150px}}
|
* Can now hold spears.
|-
|[[Zombie horse]]
|[[File:Zombie Horse_JE6.png|150px]]
|
* Now spawns naturally.
* Now counts towards the monsters mob cap.
* Has an updated texture.
* Now has 25 health points (12.5 hearts) of health.
* Spawns in darkness, and burns in sunlight like other undead mobs.
* Drops 2-3 [[rotten flesh]].
* Can be healed and tempted using red mushrooms.
* Can be tamed in the same fashion as regular [[horses]], and can then be mounted and controlled by a player.
** Tamed zombie horses are persistent and do not despawn.
** Can be equipped with a [[saddle]] and [[horse armor]].
*** Horse armor protects zombie horses from sunlight damage.
* Has variable movement speed and jump strength, determined when they spawn.
|}
